de.fhb.sailboat.data

Class Compass

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhb.sailboat.data.Compass

  • public class Compass
extends java.lang.Object
    Data object representing a compass, containing the information about the inclination of the boat in different directions.
    Author:
    hscheel

      • Compass

        public Compass(double a,
       double p,
       double r,
       double t,
       double m,
       javax.vecmath.Vector3d mvect,
       double ac,
       javax.vecmath.Vector3d acvect,
       double u)
        Parameters:
        a - for azimuth value
        p - for pitch value
        r - for roll value
        t - for temperature value
        m - for magnatic value
        mx - for magnatic-x value
        my - for magnatic-y value
        mz - for magnatic-z value
        ac - for acceleration value
        acx - for acceleration-x value
        acy - for acceleration-y value
        acz - for acceleration-z value
        u - for usefullsamplerate value

    • Method Detail

      • getYaw

        public double getYaw()

      • getAzimuth

        public double getAzimuth()
        Getter for the angle that describes the direction of the boat. The angle is relative to a fixed origin direction.
        Directions: North: 0° East: 90° South: [-]180° West: -90°
        Returns:
        the direction

      • getPitch

        public double getPitch()
        Getter for the pitch angle. It describes the angle between bow of the boat and the water surface. |__| ^ -- | | --- | pitch angle \--|--|-----------/ | \_______________/ V ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ side view
        Returns:
        the pitch angle

      • getRoll

        public double getRoll()
        Getter for the roll angle. It describes heeling of the boat. ^ |__| \ | | | roll angle \--|--|--/ | \______/ / ~~~~~~~~~~~~~ v front view
        Returns:
        the heeling angle

      • getTemperature

        public double getTemperature()
        Getter for the temperature. If not calibrated, this is the temperature inside the compass-box
        Returns:
        temperature in °C celcius degrees

      • getMagnatic

        public double getMagnatic()

      • getMagnaticField

        public double getAcceleration()

      • getAccelerationField

        public javax.vecmath.Vector3d getAccelerationField()

      • getUsefullsamplerate

        public double getUsefullsamplerate()
        Returns quality/goodness of the value e.g. 6 out of 10 sample per clock-run where usefull: 60% = 0.6
        Returns:
        rate in percent

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
